content.question: While art historians generally agree that Frida Kahloâ€™s The Two Fridas contains different layers of meaning, her depiction of a double self-portrait with exposed hearts can be interpreted as a

choices.label: reflection on the deeper spiritual meaning of her Catholic faith
meditation on her complicated relationship with her mother
critique of the violence caused by the Mexican Revolution
commentary on the complexities of Mexican cultural identity

content.answer: commentary on the complexities of Mexican cultural identity

topic.text: 4.4: Theories and Interpretations of Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
